frameDefinitions: Individuals first encounter each other and make introductions at a particular Time, Place, or Context.
A volitionally acting Interceptor takes control, without being authorized to do so by the sender, of a Theme that is underway from a sender to a recipient.
A Speaker addresses a Proposal made by an Interlocutor, either agreeing to it or rejecting it.
An Experiencer is in an undesirable Situation, whose Explanation may also be expressed.
An Event with multiple Participants takes place.
frameExamples: Impressed when he first <t>met</t> Nixon, he had always thought of him as an intelligent man, and believed that Nixon would take a stand for civil rights
Police <t>intercepted</t> the call and raided the address.
They were <t>rebuffed</t> again in the larger city of Provo. CNI
The insurers ended up in the <t>bind</t> of having to pay 15 years' taxes.
MATAC looks forward to your <t>participation</t> in helping promote telework in the Mid-Atlantic region.
listRoleDefinitions: The persons (or in rare cases animals) that make each other's acquaintance.
The semantically more prominent one of the two parties when the Individuals are realized separately.
The semantically less prominent of the two parties when the <fen>Individuals</fen> are expressed separately.
The time when the Individuals make each other's acquaintance.
The location where the Individuals make each others acquaintance.
The volitional agent who without authorization of sender or recipient takes control of a <fen>Theme</fen> that is en route to a destination.
The entity, physical or abstract, construed as traveling from a sender to a goal location, which is taken hold of by the <fen>Interceptor</fen> without permission.
The time period during which the <fen>Interceptor</fen> takes control of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Interceptor</fen> takes control of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who communicates the reply or response.

This is the person who made the <fen>Proposal</fen> to the <fen>Speaker</fen> and to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates  their response. This frame element stands in for the <fen>Proposal</fen> and is only licensed when the <fen>Proposal</fen>  can be understood from the context.
The <fen>Proposal</fen> is the prior communication or action to which a response is given.
The time interval during which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes their verbal response.
The location in which the <fen>Speaker</fen>  makes a verbal response.
The event that elicits a <fen>Response</fen>.
The means action or judgement in response to the <fen>Trigger</fen>.
The point in time when <fen>Response</fen> is made to the <fen>Trigger</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Response</fen> action takes place.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is in an undesirable <fen>Situation</fen>.
This role identifies the undesirable <fen>Situation</fen> the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is in.
Thiis role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Situation</fen> is in effect.
The location where the <fen>Situation</fen> occurs.
The individuals or entities that have been participants in an <fen>Event</fen>.
<fen>Participant_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
A grammatically less prominent participant of an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
An <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>, who may or may not be involved intentionally.
A group, location, or institution conventionally associated with an <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the multiple-participant <fen>Event</fen> occurs.
The location where the <fen>Event</fen> involving multiple <fen>Participants</fen> occurs.
listRoleExamples: <fex>My wife and I</fex> met in college working in the theatre and we will have been married for 30 years in June 2000.
<fex>Melissa Hurley</fex> had never met her neighbor, Richard Congdon ? the dog owner ? until recently, when she and a reporter knocked on his door.
Gossip reports say she either met <fex>Kennedy</fex> while helping him shop for suits at Calvin Klein, or was contacted by him after he saw her jogging in a New York park
I met my wife <fex>2 yrs ago</fex>.
Bill met his  wife <fex>in Poltava, Ukraine</fex>.

They could either sail west down the Channel or north-east to intercept <fex>an enemy making for the Thames estuary</fex>.
The five had been intercepted <fex>after a DFLP attack on March 5</fex>.
She had been intercepted <fex>outside Guy 's room</fex> and would be severely punished.
<fex>Iran</fex> on Saturday rejected Europe's proposal for ending the standoff over Tehran's nuclear program.

the guerrillas</fex>.

This must make <fex>yesterday's</fex> Taliban rebuff all the more wounding.

They found themselves in a quite <fex>a fix</fex>.

The trouble <fex>in America</fex> is only going to get worse.
